sense.def:
Z izrazom
strangely
povemo, da je neka lastnost ali dejanje nenavadno ali nepričakovano.

seg.quote: They had acted strangely as he went by.
He answered in a strangely calm voice.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
strangely
ali
strangely enough
poudarimo, da je tisto, kar govorimo, presenetljivo.

seg.quote: It has, strangely, only recently been discovered.
‘Are students interested in religion these days?’—‘Strangely enough, they are.’
